description: Detects the import of the '.reg' files from suspicious paths using the 'reg.exe' utility
name: Imports Registry Key From a File Using Reg.exe
query: (process.executable.text:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\ import\ * AND process.command_line.text:(*C\:\\Users\\* OR *%temp%* OR *%appdata%* OR *\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\Windows\\Temp\\* OR *C\:\\ProgramData\\*))
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali
